Title: You with Me
Writer: Shine D. Ricafort (story), Shine D. Ricafort (screenplay), Shine D. Ricafort
Actors: Hyun Woo, Devon Seron, Ju-hyeong Jin, Tonton Gutierrez
Plot: It tells the story of Kim who lives with her overprotective parents and meets Jayson online. She then ends up moving to Seoul and starts a new life.
